channel.title: Guys please i really need help with shops and adding items
channel.description:
hi guys, i was wondering you all could help me today to uhm teach me how to add shops and custom items really quick or just like add shops and normal items , and how to edit shops and items in shops it would really be wonderful if you could help , because im stuck on this for 2days now and i keep messing up , soo yeah im kind of new soo im not soo good at it ..
guys know how i can change the homes ? and bring all the shops to this new home including the altars and bank booths?? please
thankyou.
skype: mamali.tahamtan (canada)

item.source: Guys please i really need help with shops and adding items

item.title: Guys please i really need help with shops and adding items
item.dc:creator: @allstarrevolutionz allstarrevolutionz
item.description:
@allstarrevolutionz wrote:

Alright, first of all, when you make questions like this, post the type of code you are using
Now i’ll get to attempting to help you
To add stores/shops, you would go into your client and search for wanneshop, you should see something like this

if(NPCID == ###){ //npc id
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = ##; //the numbers you will put to define the shop id ex) 32
}

next you will go into your config and find the shops or shop handler folder, you will see something like this

shop = 28 Legends_Shop 2 2 1052 10
shop = (28=shop id)------(Legends_shop=name of shop)--------------2-----2----1052=item id----10=amount of that item

If you are still having problems comment again and i will add you on skype.

Read full topic
item.source: Guys please i really need help with shops and adding items
